section.p: To renounce the worship of the Three Fortunes, you will have to undergo a ritual. Do you want to reconsider? If so, return to 86.

‘We must determine what the Three Fortunes have to say about the matter,’ says the high priest.
.

outcomes.outcome: they demand a sacrifice of some of your blood - lose 1 Stamina point

section.p: Delete The Three Fortunes from the God box on your Adventure Sheet.
